# Uraboros

This is a [Masyu](https://puzz.link/rules.html?masyu) variant - the blue square in the middle of the grid contains a copy of the puzzle rotated 180° and the outer orange grid is another larger grid, again rotated 180°.  
**NOTE** - There is one spot where one line going through a black pearl doesn't quite go as far as it should.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2023/uraboros1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
